block.name: File Source
block.doc: Reads raw data values in binary format from the specified file. This file can be a file that was captured using a File Sink block, generated with a computer program or saved from an audio editor such as Audacity (using suitable RAW format options).

param.name: Output Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the output.

param.name: Repeat
param.doc: Selects whether to read through the file once or play it in a loop.

option.name: Yes
option.doc: When the end of file is reached, loop back to the beginning of the file and continue.

option.name: No
option.doc: Read through the data until the end of file is reached.

param.name: Vec Length
param.doc: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.
